name: Crankbrothers Tread Contact Sleeve Candy
description: Sleeves are designed to do two things: raise the contact area surrounding the pedal cleat to create a more stable connection, and protect your pretty new pedals.Made of 30% glass-filled nylon.Raising the pedal cleat is useful if you have shoes with shallow clear pockets.Includes 3 pairs with thicknesses of 1, 2, and 3mm.Weight is 2 to 5 grams per pair, depending on thickness.Compatible with Candy 11, 3, or 2.Installation requires removal of pedals.
